actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) lightning.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 80/320' one target 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) lightning.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: + 2 to its AC vs. one melee attack that would hit it if it can see attacker and wielding melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are imbued with its elemental power. When the jinnborn hits with any weapon the weapon deals an extra 1d6 lightning (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Flamboyant Defense
special_abilities.desc: While it is wearing no armor and wielding no shield its AC includes its Cha modifier.

special_abilities.name: Knows the Ropes
special_abilities.desc: Has proficiency with airships sandships or waterborne ships (the jinnborn's choice). It adds its proficiency bonus to any check it makes to control the chosen type of ship and it adds its proficiency bonus to any saves made while on the chosen type of vehicle.
